nodes.text: The Darkveil Eclipse was a space station in the Bright Jewel system during the Galactic Civil War. Located in the Scarlet Dawn quadrant, it was the center of all Black Sun operations in the system. Along with the Dual Moons, the Darkveil Eclipse formed the Salient Trinity, the three Black Sun starfighter bases in the system.

Circa 1 ABY, the Darkveil Eclipse starfighters were led by Lieutenant Commander Rilis. During the Battle of Tansarii Point Station, the Darkveil Eclipse was attacked by Dartas Pytin's Car'das starfighters. Most of the Black Sun forces were eliminated, including Rilis, ending the Black Sun/Car'das conflict.
